title: Nasus (q) bug
body: When nasus is mid aa with his q active if you switch to another target it has a huge delay on it! It makes you miss cs and you cant move soemtimes. please fix

replies.body: I've noticed this, I personally played him (Pharaoh Nasus) and almost every time I used Q on a Cannon Minion it would retarget a caster or Melee Minion and end up missing it anyway.
